content.rendered:
Playlist: May 2013

Another month, another playlist for your aural pleasure. Don't mention it.

Tracklist:

  1. The Gaslamp Killer - In The Dark
  2. Balthazar - Sinking Ship
  3. Bibio - Business Park
  4. Queens of the Stone Age - I Appear Missing
  5. Blue Daisy x Unknown Shapes - 5's Up
  6. Junip - Line Of Fire
  7. Tall Black Guy - From Home to Work and Back
  8. The Courtney John Project - Black Cinderella
  9. Run The Jewels (Killer Mike & El-P) - Get It
  10. Ghostpoet - Meltdown
  11. Thundercat - Oh Sheit, It's X!
  12. Clams Casino - Bookfiend Ft. DOOM
  13. Boards of Canada - Reach for the Dead
  14. Daughn Gibson - You Don't Fade
